title: AquaFutures Check website
description: AquaFutures, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in November 2024, is a futures prop trading firm offering a 1 Step program. The firm is backed by the same owners as AquaFunded and supports the Volumetrica Trading platform. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Automated Scalping: > 200 trades per day prohibited.
Micro Scalping: Hold trades for very brief moments captured tiny price movements prohibited.
Biggest single trade loss cannot exceed biggest single trade win during funded stage (withdrawal cycle).

payout_policy.details: 100% split up to $15k lifetime total per user, then 90%. Beginner: every 7 days, 5 winning days. Standard: every 14 days, buffer zone applies ($26.3k-$155.1k). Withdrawals below buffer zone reset max loss to balance + $100.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed if accounts belong to you, but not across multiple evaluations.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Fully automated systems prohibited. Manual involvement required.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: Trade at least once every 7 days.
firm_rules.news_trading: Not specified, but 2% Price Limit Rule applies (CME).
forbidden_strategies: Automated Scalping: > 200 trades per day prohibited.
Micro Scalping: Hold trades for very brief moments captured tiny price movements prohibited.
Biggest single trade loss cannot exceed biggest single trade win during funded stage (withdrawal cycle).

seo_content:
AquaFutures Technical Infrastructure

AquaFutures, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in November 2024, is a futures prop trading firm offering a 1 Step program. The firm is backed by the same owners as AquaFunded and supports the Volumetrica Trading platform. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: AquaFutures Full Report: Leverage, Rules & Payouts
youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of AquaFutures. We analyze their futures environment and execution rules.
